Name: Mulled Over
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
5 ml Honey syrup (3 parts honey to 1 water by weight)
Instructions: Select and pre-heat a Toddy glass .
Prepare garnish of clove studded lemon zest.
POUR all ingredients into pre-warmed glass.
Garnish with clove studded lemon zest.
Review: Spiced vodka-laced port wine with a splash of rich orange liqueur, lemon juice and honey.
History: Created in December 2024 by yours truly.
Nutrition: One serving of Mulled Over contains 106 calories
